column5: Heading up with Ice guy Don and a couple other bud's for some fun this week till thursday!With the temps remaining low up there things should be great and look forward in getting our lines wet.Will post when I return and great being back on line since moved to Ottawa. good luck to all this weekend and play safe.....Pauly
....Hey good luck up there and say hello to Don for me. Looking forward to a Nipissing report with lots of pictures.
